allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Monkey Meal Planner with 94 NHS dinner recipes and meal images

7-day calendar web app that randomly assigns unique meals from NHS Healthier Families recipes, with shuffle, swap, lock, and print features. Each day card displays the recipe photo from the NHS site.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
